data.comment: The match is underway in Lisbon.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oleg Reabciuk gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 4, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Benfica's Rafa Silva gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 10, Pacos Ferreira needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 10, Rui Costa signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Benfica's half.
Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 14, Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) strikes at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Benfica close to the penalty box.
In the minute 16, Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Benfica, close to Pacos Ferreira's area.
Rui Costa awards Benfica a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 17, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Benfica.
In the minute 18, Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benfica's Pizzi breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In the minute 21, Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Douglas Tanque (Pacos Ferreira) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 24, Goal! Oleg Reabciuk gives Pacos Ferreira a 0-1 lead in Lisbon.
Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Benfica push forward at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica and Pizzi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pacos Ferreira defence.
In the minute 30, Benfica drive forward but Darwin Nunez is judged offside.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 32, Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 33, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Benfica.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In Lisbon Pacos Ferreira's Douglas Tanque is caught offside.
In the minute 36, Benfica's Everton gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pacos Ferreira defender.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 38, Can Pacos Ferreira capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Benfica's half?
Benfica to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Benfica pushes forward through Rafa Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
Benfica drive upfield and Rafa Silva gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pacos Ferreira defender.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 45, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rui Costa will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Adel Taarabt for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Benfica.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira attack but Maracas's header doesn't find the target.
Rui Costa awards Benfica a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
The second half has started at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gabriel Appelt is on a sub for Pizzi for Benfica.
In the minute 46, Jorge Jesus is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Haris Seferovic replacing Julian Weigl.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 48, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, In Lisbon, Luther Singh of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Pacos Ferreira have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Throw-in high up the field for Pacos Ferreira in Lisbon.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Rui Costa blows against Pacos Ferreira's Mohamed Diaby for offside.
In the minute 52, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Benfica.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 55, In Lisbon Pacos Ferreira attack through Douglas Tanque. The finish is off target, however.
Benfica have a goal kick.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 58, Rafa Silva is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Gilberto instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Benfica.
Luca Waldschmidt is replacing Everton for the home team.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 62, Stephen Eustaquio (Pacos Ferreira) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Rui Costa signals a Benfica throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
In the minute 63, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 64, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Uilton is replacing Helder Ferreira for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Pacos Ferreira make their second substitution with Luiz Carlos replacing Mohamed Diaby.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Stephen Eustaquio is booked for the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 67, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Haris Seferovic of Benfica gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
In Lisbon Pacos Ferreira drive forward through Uilton. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 72, Darwin Nunez hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Benfica in Lisbon.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
In the minute 73, Rui Costa signals a Benfica throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Jordi (Pacos Ferreira) has received a yellow card from Rui Costa.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Benfica.
Pepa (Pacos Ferreira) is making a third substitution, with Joao Amaral replacing Luther Singh.
The away team have replaced Maracas with Marco Baixinho. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pepa.
Benfica's Nicolas Otamendi has been booked in Lisbon.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 77, Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt is whistled for offside at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica, Uilton has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Adel Taarabt with Pedrinho.
Benfica make their fifth substitution with Chiquinho replacing Rafa Silva.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Benfica.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Pedro is replacing Douglas Tanque for the away team.
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Benfica.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 89, In Lisbon Pacos Ferreira attack through Joao Amaral. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Pacos Ferreira's Uilton misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Benfica goal kick.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira are coming forward and Bruno Costa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benfica have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Benfica's Luca Waldschmidt scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Gabriel Appelt.
